verses.text: Unto \w the|strong="H1732"\w* end. \w A|strong="H1732"\w* \w psalm|strong="H4210"\w* \w for|strong="H1732"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

\w In|strong="H0430"\w* thy strength, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w the|strong="H3068"\w* king \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* joy; \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy salvation \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rejoice \w exceedingly|strong="H0430"\w*.

Thou hast given \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* heartâ€™s desire: \w and|strong="H7971"\w* hast not withholden \w from|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H7971"\w* \w will|strong="H6726"\w* \w of|strong="H6944"\w* \w his|strong="H7971"\w* lips.

\w For|strong="H3605"\w* thou hast prevented \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w with|strong="H3605"\w* blessings \w of|strong="H3605"\w* sweetness: thou hast set \w on|strong="H3605"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* head \w a|strong="H3605"\w* crown \w of|strong="H3605"\w* precious stones.

\w He|strong="H5414"\w* asked life \w of|strong="H3605"\w* thee: \w and|strong="H3824"\w* thou hast \w given|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* length \w of|strong="H3605"\w* days \w for|strong="H3605"\w* ever \w and|strong="H3824"\w* ever.

\w His|strong="H3605"\w* glory \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* \w in|strong="H0430"\w* thy \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w*: glory \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w great|strong="H0430"\w* beauty shalt thou lay upon \w him|strong="H3605"\w*.

\w For|strong="H3588"\w* thou shalt \w give|strong="H6030"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H3588"\w* blessing \w for|strong="H3588"\w* ever \w and|strong="H3068"\w* ever: thou shalt \w make|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* joyful \w in|strong="H3068"\w* gladness \w with|strong="H3068"\w* thy countenance.

\w For|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* king hopeth \w in|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*: \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w through|strong="H8034"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w mercy|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H0430"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* most High \w he|strong="H0430"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H2142"\w* \w be|strong="H8034"\w* moved.
Let thy hand be found \w by|strong="H6965"\w* all thy \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w*: let thy right hand find \w out|strong="H6965"\w* all \w them|strong="H1992"\w* \w that|strong="H5307"\w* hate thee.

Thou shalt \w make|strong="H7121"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w as|strong="H3068"\w* \w an|strong="H7121"\w* oven \w of|strong="H4428"\w* fire, \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w time|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* thy anger: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w trouble|strong="H3467"\w* \w them|strong="H7121"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* wrath, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fire \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* devour \w them|strong="H7121"\w*.
Their fruit shalt thou destroy from the earth: and their seed from among the children of men.
For they have intended evils against thee: they have devised counsels which they have not been able to establish.
For thou shalt make them turn their back: in thy remnants thou shalt prepare their face.
Be thou exalted, O Lord, in thy own strength: we will sing and praise thy power.
